TEXT.English: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grape Arbors[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's culture and commerce, and can increase the happiness output from using the culture slider. A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grape Arbor[COLOR_REVERT] also provides culture and is required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Globe Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.
TEXT.French: La [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]tonelle de vin[COLOR_REVERT] augmente la culture et le commerce de la ville et peut augmenter le bonheur davantage avec le curseur de culture. Il procure aussi de la culture et permet de construire le [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]théâtre du globe[COLOR_REVERT] (merveille nationale).
TEXT.German: [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grape Arbors[COLOR_REVERT] increase a city's culture and commerce, and can increase the happiness output from using the culture slider. A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grape Arbor[COLOR_REVERT] also provides culture and is required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Globe Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.

A [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Grape Arbor[COLOR_REVERT] also provides culture and is required to build the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Globe Theatre[COLOR_REVERT] national wonder.

TEXT.English: [TAB]The Uyghur people are hugely welcoming to guests. The grape arbor provides blissful shelter from the relentless sun, and to sit here in such a comfortable courtyard and enjoy a moment of cool breeze under the grapevine is a real treat in itself. Even if you were a stranger, they would welcome you with whole-hearted hospitality, offering all they have - from tea to fresh fruits to dry fruits to home made yogurt to refresh you.
